description: This file demonstrates the usage of the GeminiEmbedder for generating embeddings from text and integrating it with an AgentKnowledge object that uses a PgVector database for storage.

classes.name: AgentKnowledge
classes.description: Represents a knowledge base that uses a vector database for storing embeddings.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class for interacting with a PostgreSQL vector database.

classes.name: GeminiEmbedder
classes.description: A class for generating embeddings using Google's Gemini model.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Generates embeddings for a given text input.
